name: execute : Download Configuration
xml:
<execute plugin='com.att.sdnctl.restconf.RestConfCallNode' method='downloadDeviceConfiguration' >
<parameter name="hostIpAddress" value="`$host-ip-address`"/>
<parameter name="configData" value="`$device-config`"/>
<parameter name="protocol" value="`$protocol`"/>
<parameter name="unescapeXML" value="N"/>
<parameter name="validateXML" value="Y"/>

name: return failure
xml:
<return status="failure">
<parameter name="error-message" value="Unable to Download Config to Device" />
<parameter name="error-code" value="401" />
 <parameter name="ack-final" value="Y"/>

name: execute : Mount Device
xml:
<execute plugin='com.att.sdnctl.restconf.RestConfCallNode' method='mountDevice' >
<parameter name="templateFileName" value="device_mount.xml" />
<parameter name="hostIpAddress" value="`$host-ip-address`"/>
<parameter name="loginId" value="`$device-login`"/>
<parameter name="password" value="`$device-password`"/>
<parameter name="portNumber" value="`$port-number`"/>
<parameter name="waitSec" value="60"/>
<parameter name="noOfRetriggers" value="10"/>

name: return failure
xml:
<return status='failure'>
<parameter name='ack-final' value='Y'/>
<!-- error should be set by Adaptor -->

name: record
xml:
<record plugin="org.onap.ccsdk.sli.core.sli.recording.Slf4jRecorder">
<parameter name="level" value="info"/>
<parameter name="logger" value="message-log"/>
<parameter name="field1" value="__TIMESTAMP__"/>
<parameter name="host" value="`$service-configuration-operation-input.vnf-config-information.vnf-host-ip-address`"/>
<parameter name="SFTPERRORCODE" value="`$error-code`"/>
<parameter name="SFTPERRORMESSAGE" value="`$error-message`"/>

name: return success
xml:
<return status='success'>
<!-- Dont over write error code and message -->
